name: starilign adventure demo
description:
here's Starilign Adventure Demo where you Play as a white cat known as Star Lightness who's on a magical adventure to stop her rival Emily Darkness from what evil she's going to do. you'll be also fighting against Emily's minions and heartlessers through out the game (got help with some of the codes from my teacher)

(in the demo, three different type of enemies and one boss will be there)

(if you collect all the jewels in all levels then you'll unlock the true final boss)
